website_summaries.verdict: The perfect bed if you are looking to invest in your dog's health and comfort while still enjoying the convenience of an outdoor mat.
pros: The luxurious memory foam cushions are thick enough to provide orthopedic support to dogs with joint pain or arthritis
Customers rave over its durable, water-resistant fabric
Easy to vacuum and clean thanks to the no-skid liner crafted into the bottom of the mat
cons: Buyers wished the fabric was waterproof
Some owners had problems with the cover's zipper breaking

customer_reviews.title: We bought an XL for our 105 on Great Pyrenees and I worried it would be large enough
customer_reviews.text: We bought an XL for our 105 lb Great Pyrenees and I worried it would not be large enough. It's perfect and she has some room to spare. It's well made and very comfortable evidenced by the many naps she takes in it. I would recommend this to other large dog owners. She now chooses this bed over her other dog bed. It must feel good on her old bones 💗
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs and a lot of dog beds. I was looking for something supportive for my older dog. This bed purchase has been the best so far. Easy to put together right out of the box; the bolster is already zippered in and the mattress, once unsealed and expanded, fits easily into its cover and zips in to the bottom portion. So far it has been easy to vacuum and clean. The bed is light and easily movable, yet doesn't shift when on the floor. My old lab loves it! He is close to 80 lbs and the large size works for him. I will purchase this bed again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very toxic smell
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited because this dog bed looks really cute in the pictures but when it arrived the smell is SO bad, it smells like chemcles and I realized it’s made in China. I only want USA made products especially when it comes to the bed my dogs sleep and spend a lot of time in. Who wants their child inhaling toxic fumes? No one. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for big dogs!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL bed for my German Shepherd mix who is 95 lbs and he absolutely loves it!! I was nervous that he wouldn't have enough room, but it is plenty big. He has extra room on all sides to spread out, so he is one happy pup!! The thickness of the bed is really thick and memory foam seems like good quality. On previous beds, he would sink to the floor, but not on this one. Overall, worth splurging for!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 beds for our dogs. Very impressed with the quality and style of the beds. Dogs love them too as you can see!
customer_reviews.author: NYMO

customer_reviews.title: a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it, so time will tell but so far my pup loves it! He had unexpected TPLO surgery & I put him in it when we got home & he has slept soundly since. So far, a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: tozzigirl

customer_reviews.title: Your first choice
customer_reviews.text: This bed has to be your first choice. Our Golden Retriever loved it from the time it was delivered and set up. The memory foam gives him incredible support in any position. Although he is a young dog, I would think this bed is perfect for older dogs whose joints are beginning to stiffen. I have placed the bed in my office and he lies there happily for hours watching me work. We will consider getting another for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Docta K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Excellent quality. Worth the extra money. Actually fits our lab and golden retriever together. Neither got up on my bed in the middle of the night...which says a lot!! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Mari W

customer_reviews.title: Our chocolate lab loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our dog as his Christmas present since his old bed was becoming old and tattered. Since he is an older dog I thought I'd splurge and get an orthopedic bed so it would be better on his bones (his other bed was a cheap one from Home Goods). He definitely loves it! He tried to lay on it before we even got it fully assembled. Now he sleeps on it all the time! He is a 108 lb chocolate lab so we ordered the XL pewter one and he fits on it perfectly with a little extra room if he decides to curl up.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ordonia

customer_reviews.title: A great supportive bed for your 4-legged children
customer_reviews.text: The bed is a big hit with our 2 bulldogs; the bolster pillow sides make great supporting pillows for their heads. We liked it so much we ordered one for our daughter's pit- bully mix, and she (Clara the dog) bonded with it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this bed, highly recommend. I got a Big Barker for my lab a week ago and then got this bed for my Pittie today, my lab layed in it first, lol! Quality of memory foam is nice and has water proof cover. Nice quality and looks great! Oh and this is the Large size. Perfect fit for my 62-72lb pups!!
customer_reviews.author: SunnyDay01

customer_reviews.title: Disintegrating Memory Foam! Refund/replacement needed.
customer_reviews.text: The foam of the mattress arrived at my home already in a disintergrating state! Giving off a toxic smelling white powder that triggered my children at home to have asthma attack. Totally unacceptable, and now they will only refund if I send it back from Hong Kong to US which will cost a lot of money and my time! Please sort it out, or I will file further complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: A great bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog Lucy is enjoying this bed tremendously. I bought it to replace her old bed from 3 1/2 years ago. I have not yet wash it but a friend who recommended this item tells me she has washed hers and it does very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: 1 star from 5 stars...
customer_reviews.text: Was 5 stars...Loved this dog bed. Washed it for the first time, put back together and the zipper separated starting in the middle. I took apart again, unzipped to rezip and pull came completely off...now I cannot get back on! Frustrating too much money to break so soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tressa

customer_reviews.title: cheapo zipper- doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: When I went to assemble the bed and close up the zipper that holds the foam, the handle on the zipper BROKE! So now its pretty much worthless to me because I cant finish closing it or if I used it half zipped, when it came time to wash the cover I wouldnt be able to get it off. Other than that, bed seemed fine. Except there were some weird yellow spots on the foam. Can't tell if a moisture issue or just a color issue in the foam. Can't recommend this...
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Is a very nice bed and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Is a very nice bed and very comfortable. The only problem is that the bed has a cold feel to it like a cooling pad that you'd get to cool down your dog in the Summer. Same material so it makes my little dog cold. She's a Terrier mix so she doesn't have much hair and is bald on her little belly and has to have a something warmer to lay on but a blanket takes up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: His child

customer_reviews.title: bad advertising.
customer_reviews.text: This was maximum 7" in thickness at its highest point. in no way is it what it was advertised to be. It is somewhat flimsy compared to the picture and certainly not sturdy enough for an extra large dog to lay in and have the weight comfortably supported.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Dog Bed Not Just For Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing uh.....CAT bed! I have a couple of 20 lb kitties and lesser who are all 10-13 years old and they all love it. Just washed the cover and it came out beautifully although it was a struggle for one person to get it back on. I highly recommend this for kitties too! It was even used when the cover was off!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Ish don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: WTH why is the foam base bigger than the liner??!!! Grrrrr ghetto
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Snuggling Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed!!! We have gone through a lot of dog beds and this by far is mine and the furries favorite! This is the Large and an old 15 pound pug, 70 pound English Bull dog and a 10 pound Brussels griffon fits in there all snuggly and comfy!!! Not to mention it is a well made and quality bed. We recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyJ

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I relied on the customer reviews. Big mistake. First of all, the pewter color is not that nice silver as pictured but is a dark gun metal, not pretty, gray. The suede cover is a magnet for everything, even with a non-shedding poodle. HOWEVER, the worst thing is when you wash it. All bolster beds are a nightmare to put back together so expected that. There's a rubber non-slip material on the bottom of the bed that DISINTEGRATES all over. Little black pieces all over the washer and dryer and continues to come off on my carpet. Waste of money, looking for a replacement bed.
customer_reviews.author: riverhomegal

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Update - I have had these beds for a couple months now, and they are not waterproof. I tried cleaning pee out of the foam and it didn’t work. So I basically have two useless beds. My dog just got diagnosised with incontience, and so if she has anymore accidents these beds are basically worthless. Save your money! My dogs with arthritis love these beds! I love that I can vacuum them easily, which was a challenge with several of the previous beds.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Riley

customer_reviews.title: Friends Forever DOES NOT HONOR WARRANTY AND BED ONLY LASTS 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bed for our 10 year old English Bulldog. He loves these types of beds, but this one does not last long at all. There is no phone number on the company website and they have never returned any emails over several months of trying to reach the company. I purchased this bed originally party because they showed a 2 year warranty on the Amazon page for the bed and the replacement cover. We also got a replacement after the bed torn up in the first few months, but the replacement cover tore easily and within a couple months again. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: My Golden dislikes it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my Golden Retriver doesn’t like it all. After many weeks of trying everything he would maximum spend 5 minutes on it then leave. Too late to return it but that’s my fault as I remained committed to making it work. Now it’s just in the room for decoration and we’re going to purchase another bed for him. The interesting part is the seller emailed me asking for input, I responded that he doesn’t like it and they didn’t even acknowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boxer loves her new bed....so does my 16 year old.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog who thinks she should be able to sleep on the couch or our beds loves this bed! She got on it after I opened it up and put it in the living room. Now she will go lay on her bed instead of trying to get on the couch!! We bought a large and our dog is about 50lbs. She has plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse_MDG

customer_reviews.title: great, until you wash the cover
customer_reviews.text: This bed is nice looking, well constructed, and seems comfortable for my dog. I also appreciate the easy in removing the cover off and on the paddings for easy washing. I wash the covering on cool temp on gentle cycle. Despite that, the second washing of the cover resulted in many of the small grip beads on the bottom for grip coming off in the washer and sticking to everything else I had in the wash. What a mess! I'm so disappointed, because otherwise this is a fantastic dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: ruthm

customer_reviews.title: WOW this bed is amazing!! Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: WOW this bed is amazing!! Worth every cent! Very durable, easy to keep clean, and my dog loves it. I went for size Large and my 80 pound boxer fits comfortably with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: My golden loved it immediately!
customer_reviews.text: Our 70 lb golden, Gracie, just loves her new bed! We purchased the XL and as you can see, she has plenty of room in it. I have never paid this much for a dog bed, but based on all the fabulous reviews I decided to go for it! It is wonderful quality and the memory foam seems high quality as well - great for older arthritic dogs like Gracie. She jumped right in - barely gave me time to assemble it. I’ve ordered the large for our 60 lb lab mix and will order an XL for our other Golden because they are all trying to steal it from Gracie!
customer_reviews.author: S. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Durable quality & aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, this is an excellent dog bed. We have had it for 16 months and it’s still in excellent shape. The cover looks new and the bolsters and memory foam base are still full. We got the Large size for our lab-pit mix (85 pounds) and there is room to spare for our 23 pound Frenchie. It is also aesthetically pleasing. Our only issue is that the cover is not washable. We had an unfortunate incident where a bottle of nail polish was spilled on the bed and there was no easy way to clean it. However most messes spot clean easily from the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Post It Note

customer_reviews.title: Large heavy bed that's comfortable but the cover is poor
customer_reviews.text: Great and very large bed. The cover is the problem. Our husky fortunately really likes the comfort on it and it's really heavy so won't move easily. The biggest problem that my wife has with it is the cover. It's ripped in the less than two days we have owned it. I'm super disappointed with how much we spent on this and it still is coming apart. Not sure what we can do about the cover other than to try to find a new cover.
customer_reviews.author: Rikk Caro

customer_reviews.title: Only buy the XL if you have a giant breed dog, or maybe two dogs that will share this.
customer_reviews.text: The XL was bigger than I expected. We have a 70 pound lab that I thought would need the XL bed, but she look small in this one (they only take up 2/3rds of it). Order a large if you have a large, but not giant breed dog. The bolster around the edges is quite large and looks a bit uncomfortable when they put their head on it.
customer_reviews.author: John Bannon

customer_reviews.title: Dog toy or Dog bed?
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so noisy my dogs rarely lay on it-- as a matter of fact, my 6-year-old granddaughter uses it the most to chill and read her books, she likes to pretend that she is a dog. The inner mattress is covered in a waterproof material that makes a crinkling noise that is super annoying and upsets all 5 of my dog. For reference we have a yorkie, mini schnauzer, cavachon, giant schnauzer, and a pitbull-- that's quite a variety of personalities and a lot of NO's for this bed. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not chew proof
customer_reviews.text: My 13 pound dog loves this bed so much, I bought her two of them. She lounges against the sides and loves eating her chews on it. The memory foam is very comfortable. 5 stars for comfort. However, it is NOT chew proof. She’s only 13 pounds and managed to chew a huge hole into the side of the bed and tear our pieces of memory foam. 1 Star for staying it was chew proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t open mattress until you have the cover ready.
customer_reviews.text: It took a few days for our Australian cattle dog to accept the new bed but the old one was falling apart a couldn’t be washed again. He loves it now and the orthopedic mattress provides good support for our old arthritic dog. Be sure to put the mattress inside the cover as soon as you open it or it will be difficult to fit it in. We got the XL cause we didn’t want to crowd the old guy but a LG would have been big enough for his 60 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: PZ

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Approved
customer_reviews.text: The puppy's new favorite place. Materials - The bed is well built. Seams are not noticeable. No snags. The zipper is a little weak (don't tug too hard), but otherwise good. Packaging - Packaged well, almost too well. The pad was well sealed. If the package was soaked, it would have been fine. Size - I bought the large. Our puppy is 30lbs and he has lots of room. Most important, our puppy loves it! Within 5 minutes of setting down his bed, he was in it and sound asleep. I haven't washed it yet or dealt with wild puppy; I will update once I do.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I’ve ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: This is, without question, the nicest dog bed I have ever purchased!! My puppy loves it, the pewter color is gorgeous, it’s extremely well made and it has all the features I wanted in a bed...supportive mattress (oh is it ever!!) and also the bolster sides, non skid bottom, easy to put together and remove cover for washing. It’s beyond perfect and absolutely worth every single penny. Also, even with the extended delivery time that was stated is needed due to the size of the item, it still arrived earlier than expected. For comparison for others considering this bed, she’s 11 months old and weighs 55 lbs. I ordered the XL size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: BEST DECISION EVER
customer_reviews.text: I can't give this product enough stars. Before it was even fully expanded, I couldn't get my 11 year old Doberman mix off of it. The first nap she took on it, she didn't twitch a muscle for two hours. The bottom pad is super thick and dense making the whole bed very heavy, and the bolsters are PERFECT for my dog that likes a snuggly sleep. I will be getting another one for our bedroom soon.
customer_reviews.author: sarabugstar

customer_reviews.title: great design but brown fabric stained wall
customer_reviews.text: 9.6.18 Now that I have had the bed for a while, need to drop the rating because the bed stained my wall brown. Even the Mr Clean bleach scrubber was not able to remove it. Otherwise the bed is still holding up and my bully hasn't chewed it up. this was the 1st of 3 new beds to survive. bed came fast, easy to put together ( just need to slip the bottom foam pad into the cover). I really like that the cover on the bottom and on the top zip off. Easy to wash and dry. the dog loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Sand

customer_reviews.title: and they really make you feel like a valued customer and not just a number
customer_reviews.text: First the customer service communications from the company are very high quality, and they really make you feel like a valued customer and not just a number. I would give 5 stars for customer service and buying experience. I'm giving 3 stars on product quality. I love the suede material on the top and sides of the bed, but the bottom is a cheap flimsy material that I am just waiting for my dog to shred - really disappointing because the rest of the covering is so nice and the foam inside is high quality. If the bottom was made of something more durable this product would be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Our dog picks this over our bed
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace our old dog bed as it wasn’t easy to clean and the memory foam was getting pretty beat. Our 67 lb lab loves it. We wanted something comfortable, that would be easy to wash, big enough for a lab and that fit our color scheme (gray). This is perfect. Our lab is allowed in our bed on weekends and we found that she gets out of our bed in the middle of the night to go back to hers now. She really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: High-quality construction and materials, firm cushion support, well designed
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed was exactly what I wanted at the ideal price point. The foam pad expands after unpacking into a firm cushion, and the washable and removable faux-suede lining fits perfectly over the cushion. The bed is embroidered with a bolster arm that runs along 3 out of 4 sides, providing a chin rest for pets. Most importantly, the foam is firm and dense, affording older or arthritic pets the proper support they need. The materials were brand new, good quality, and precisely constructed with neat seams. I ended up buying 2 of these beds—1 Large for my dogs to sleep in, and 1 Small as a lounger in living areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Eyre

customer_reviews.title: GSD loves to snuggle.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Sasha loves her new bed. She tucks her head into the soft bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Alaimo

customer_reviews.title: Great for aging dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed! For years I've thrown money away on cheaper dog beds that claimed to provide support for an aging dog, but then the padding would thin out in just a few weeks. This bed has gotten even fluffier since I've purchased it and my senior dog seems to sleep more comfortably each night. The material is durable, and the bed overall is good quality. I am planning on buying another one for our younger pup.
customer_reviews.author: ccommons

customer_reviews.title: very high quality bed!!
customer_reviews.text: washes well and very impressed with fabric and construction!! This bed was much bigger than expected for a small bed so I had to give it as a gift to a friend's pet. The memory foam was very thick with a great snoozing factor. I purchased an extra cover so the bed is always useable. My only draw back is that I wish they made a smaller size!!!!! this is by far the best pet bed on the market !!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B.

customer_reviews.title: Cover is junk
customer_reviews.text: I posted a review about this already. I was contacted by email from company asking me to delete or edit my negative review. If I did they would give me a $50 Amazon credit. I said ok and deleted and also asked to get a replacement cover since the bed is good just the cover is not. After all it’s $118 bed that started to break down within a month and fell apart within a few months. Well no $50 credit or cover so thought I’d make known the quality of this product! Not to mention they keep their word!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Kat

customer_reviews.title: Plush yet supportive, comfy & just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Hi! My name is Cheyenne and I have really bad arthritis. My mom bought this sofa for me so that I could be with her comfortably in our new seasonal room. The color matches the decor really well. But what I like is that it is super comfy & plush. And big enough for me to spread out when I want to. The bolster sides give me good support too. So...if u have a 4 legged that u luv, don’t hesitate to buy this❣️
customer_reviews.author: S. Killian

customer_reviews.title: NOT a washable cover
customer_reviews.text: We were initially thrilled with this bed. However, we just removed and washed the "washable" cover. Every single one of the non-skid plastic pieces on the bottom of the bed came off in the washer. All over the washer, all over the floor. For the price we paid, this should not have happened, especially since it is represented as a washable cover. I would have preferred to contact the company directly rather than airing complaints via a written review but couldn't figure out how to do so. I hope they can make this right.
customer_reviews.author: K. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Some good and some bad....not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is comfortable and my dog loves it. I like the waterproof cover and the zippers. Unfortunately the cover is not that great. Everytime I was the cover, a lot of the black bumps that are on the bottom (to prevent skidding) come off. Not only it's a pain to find them and remove them (so my dog doesn't end up eating them) but also it just shows that the cover is not durable. For the price I expected higher quality.... Update: Contacted the customer service. NEver got a response back!
customer_reviews.author: Amir H. Hormati

customer_reviews.title: Smokey likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a new bed for Smokey Cat to go in the newly redecorated family room. I left it next to her old one to see which she preferred. She loves it. Its big enough for her to stretch out. If you follow the directions, it is very easy to assemble. I left it outside in the sun for several hours the first day. She would probably buy one for every room! It arrived quickly, too.
customer_reviews.author: codegal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design, execution and value, fast shipping and most importantly the pooch loves her new bed. It combines all the features that I know from experience make for a comfortable and long lasting pet bed; durable microfiber suede cover that can be removed for washing, memory foam pad with waterproof zippered cover and deep bolster on 3 sides for security and support. It appears to be very well constructed and I fully expect that this bed will last my pups entire lifetime. I have seen beds of this quality in those "designer" dog catalogs for double the price. I'm super happy with this purchase and highly recommend both the product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: 2dogone

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bed..
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, cleans easily, holds shape long term. I have 3 in different colors. They all look beautiful. Dogs love them. The foam mattress is so comfy, you'll want to cuddle up on the bed yourself ;) I use a throw over it to help protect the bed... the cover has resisted being punctured and stands up well to being washed on a normal cycle in the washing machine. The mattress can also be hand washed (gently) and air dried.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit with watch

customer_reviews.title: 8 Paws Up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these in the XL size and for my two rescue greyhounds, they are a little bigger than what I thought was the right size. That being said and I could have gone a size smaller, these beds are well made and the memory foam is nice and thick. The suede like cover is easy to clean especially because my girls prefer their treats in bed. A quick wipe and done. To compensate a bit for the size, I put in a couple of inexpensive throw pillows and now my girls give it 8 paws up!
customer_reviews.author: Lazzara74

customer_reviews.title: Love the dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these dog beds for our pitbull and our golden doodle. They love the beds. My only regret is buying the brown beds. They show the dirt/slobber terribly. (Kinda like a darker car shows dirt easier). I should have bought a lighter color. We love the beds. I have not tried to wash it yet. It in zips on the side so you can remove the outer cover.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure my Husky would like the bed as the one before she wouldn't lay on. Right away she went on and laid down and she loves it. She also likes to sleep in my bedroom so I bought a second one. Only have had both for a day to 2 weeks and so far, easy to assemble. Took all of a minute. Chose gray that blends well with my furniture. I highly recommend this dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S. Searle

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Our new dog bed is very attractive - like another piece of furniture - except for our puppy. It is well made with great stitching detail and the fabric appears durable and easy to clean. The memory foam on the floor maintains its shape, and the bolsters also keep their shape. Our pup loves her new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Going to dump today
customer_reviews.text: Update: cover is split, washing and reassembling is a nightmare, dog has to struggle to get out of it. All in all, a total waste of money. I've had the bed for just over a month and the fabric is already wearing on top. I have a handicapped dog who can't always control his bladder, and taking this bed apart to wash, and reassembling afterwards, is a tremendous amount of work. I'll now have to buy a waterproof cover for another $60 to alleviate some of the time and energy I spend on it. Too bad. As an Amazon's Choice, I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: California Jo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good sized bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought the XL in pewter for my 65-poind Lab/pittie mix. She had plenty of space to sleep sprawled out, but usually curls up and has plenty of room left over. She loves the bolsters, which are comfy but firm. The mattress fluffed up right away upon opening and fit easily inside the rest of the bed. I accidentally unzipped the bolster stuffing, which was pretty difficult to stuff back in properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Instant success
customer_reviews.text: I got my lovely Mya from a rescue on Sunday, and had two beds given to me by my sister ready for her. She flat-out ignored both. I ordered this one as a long-term solution, and the moment I unboxed it and put it together, she lay right down on it and went to sleep. Up to this point, she'd been literally sleeping on my feet as I work from home during this Covid-19 situation, so this is a huge win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Leland Perrin

customer_reviews.title: most coveted bed
customer_reviews.text: this was a high quality dog bed. i read through hundreds of reviews for many similar beds and finally picked this one because it seemed to have the most consistently high reviews. it looks great and cleans up easily in the wash. the zipper functioned well many times but one of the times it broke—i contacted the company and they stood by their 2 yr guarantee. did i mention that this is hands down the favorite bed for all 8 of our dogs? clearly we need to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality but your mileage may vary
customer_reviews.text: The bed cover lasted about 1 year. My dog likes to scratch at the cover before going to bed. He usually scratches in the same spot. After a year, it developed a large tear. The foam and liner are still in good shape, so I am using it with a different cover. I have 2 dogs. One dog will sleep on this bed. The other dog seems to prefer the LL Bean beds instead of this one. The other thing I did not like about this bed is the bolster. Although my dog likes to rest his head on it, it creates a nice crevice that traps dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: ziggy787

customer_reviews.title: Proven Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these beds 1.5 years ago, since then bought 3 other "cheaper" beds for other parts of the house. All 3 cheaper ones have worn out, so I just bought the second of these beds. My dog obviously prefers them! She won't lay on the cheap ones now. They vacuum clean and wash much better than any others. The 1.5 year old bed has no worn spots, nothing torn and my dog still loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this bed. We move it around sometimes to keep him near us if we're hanging out in our bedroom or the living room, and when we do move it he always looks for his bed. He used to scratch up his old bed in the middle of the night trying to make it comfortable. Now he doesn't do that at all and sleeps like a king.
customer_reviews.author: M. Giraldo

customer_reviews.title: My dogs favorite place to sleep.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this. I got a large for my lab, who is tall and lanky, also known as Field Lab, not the English style. He is 75lbs and 24 inches tall at the shoulder. He can't stretch out, but this still fits him well. He loves the padded couch style back and sides. As an 8 year old dog, he prefers sleeping on this bed over my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L

customer_reviews.title: Dog was not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my dog did not like this bed. Not fluffy more of a foam pad feel. Wide, with low edges,not high enough for my small/med terrier to rest his head on. Not a good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Loya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bed for dogs with back issues
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yo dachshund cam down with IVDD a few months back. He has gone through therapy and has made amazing progress where he is able to walk again, but has been waking me up at 4 am with restlessness for months since this happened. Last night was his first night on his new Friends Forever bed and he loves it! He slept right through the night for the first time in a very long time! I have to think that this bed made him more comfortable to sleep! Yay!!! I am so happy I cannot even begin to tell you! This is an awesome bed! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Martin

customer_reviews.title: Missing foam padding!!! Amazon replaced the bed.
customer_reviews.text: Bed arrived without the foam pad. Had to return for exchange. Not usable as delivered. Update: rec'd replacement. New bed in original box. First bed was in amazon box with other items (maybe was a return). Very easy to assemble. Placed new bed 3' from the old bed. My 11yo chihuahua chose the new bed and slept in it the whole nite. More room for her to stretch out. Bolster not as high as the old bed, better height for her to rest her head. I think this is a winner. Will update if durability becomes an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Cook

customer_reviews.title: Dog is not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my West Highland White Terrier does not like this bed. I have tried everything -- taking it apart and washing it, moving it to different places in my house and removing the waterproof liner but my dog will not use it. I can only assume it's because she doesn't like the suede material as that is the only thing that is different from her other beds. I plan to donate it to a local animal shelter given other animals obviously think it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Older Dog
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I washed the cover and it came out like new. It was easy to unzip to wash and just as easy to put it all back together. Finally, a dog bed that’s super high quality and easy to wash! I bought this when my 13 y/o pittie was diagnosed with Spondylosis. He absolutely loves this bed and is in it any chance he gets. He's about 65lbs and I bought a large. Fits him perfectly with enough room to move around and run in his sleep. We've only had it for a few weeks, but it's held up. I haven't had to wash it yet as I've used blankets to protect he fabric. Will report back once I do.
customer_reviews.author: TipsyNamaste

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dog bed for a little over a month and just washed it for the first time. It was easy to wash and dry and came out soft and feeling like suede. Everything, and I mean everything, has a zippered cover - even the water resistant inner covers on the bolster and the memory foam base. And it's bigger than you think. I ordered small for my 15 pound dog and there's plenty of room left for the 15 pound cat. This is the best quality dog bed I have ever owned and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Big yellow stains on mattress / cloth does NOT wash well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed just about a year and it is utterly disgusting. It is supposed to be wet- proof but the mattress inside has yellow stains! I bought a bed for less than half the price that does a much better job of washing and the mattress doesn't have big stains on it! Friends Forever has seriously been a rip-off. Not sure how to contact them directly but this is a scam of a price on a dog bed...shouldn't have trusted the high rated reviews. I want a refund!
customer_reviews.author: LeenyBeany

customer_reviews.title: Best ever for my girls.
customer_reviews.text: I have two large pets - 74lbs each, and one with arthritis. As soon as I replaced them with my their old beds, Bella, took to it immediately. The reason I got them was because Bella would get up during the night to go sleep on the couch which was more supportive. Since I purchased these beds, she has not once gotten up during the night to go sleep on the couch! Tiger, my other girl, loves her bed as well. That to me is proof of how comfortable and supportive these beds are. Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.author: qbanita

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, lots of support, doesn't sag
customer_reviews.text: My 65 pound Dobermans love this bed. The foam pad is thick and provides plenty of support for my big babies. The bolstered edges don't sag when they lie their heads on it. I got the large, which has plenty of room for one of them to sleep comfortably inside (though they manage to squeeze both of their butts in there). One of my dogs doesn't even sleep in the bed with me anymore. She only wants THIS bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nino

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this bed. Every dog that visits immediately lays down on it. This is a great dog bed. I bought it when my golden retriever was sick with cancer to have him be as comfortable as he possibly can be. This bed is amazing - he slept like a baby and it really meant a lot to me for him to be comfortable. This bed is so durable, it does not lose firmness or shape with time. I've had it for over 3 years and it's still good as new (and my pets are not petite ahem!) Great buy, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mag

customer_reviews.title: Careful what its touching
customer_reviews.text: While I and my dog love this bed it seems to have rubbed off some color on the floor and the white closet door and white mouldings it was against. I tried to scrub it off but cannot get it off and will probably end up re painting my closet doors and mouldings. The floor I figure it will wear off or blend in more eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: MY DOG LOVES THIS
customer_reviews.text: Ive yet to clean the bed, but i can say my dog loves this. He is a 50lb mixed and he likes to stretch out, rest his head on something or nest. this bed offers him space for all of those options. He used to always sleep on the couch or bed and now he prefers to lay in his bed because its so cozy for him. The fabric is nice and soft and the interior is like memory foam. Seems it will hold up much better than the pillow fill we had in our last bed. Ill update this review once we give it a wash.
customer_reviews.author: City girl Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: I have to buy two now
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small bed for one of my dogs. Since her old bed ripped on the bottom (different brand). I have two small dogs. I decided to test out this bed by sitting it in their room alongside their other 2 old beds. When I checked the petcube/dog camera they both took over this new bed. They never sleep together and hate being close by each other. They each love this bed I am going to buy a second one so they have their own. It was easy to put together. I haven't tested out washing it yet. Hoping it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F.

customer_reviews.title: Great sofa bed.WORTH IT !
customer_reviews.text: This bed is GREAT! I ordered the large size for my rescue German shepherd/Huskie mix Lexi , weighing 65 pounds. She loves her new bed..it doesn't sink in like regular dog beds. I ordered the Cocoa brown color. The bed was ultra-cozy, soft, plush, comfortable and relaxing for Lexi. It's perfect to snuggle up! We all loved the color and style! She has a nice pillow lip along the bed which is perfect for when she wants to rest her head. Lexi is grateful for her bed and I am thankful for the good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: The BEST I've ever found!
customer_reviews.text: The best bed I've ever gotten for my buddy! He's a 6 year old, 125 lb German Short Hair Pointer and I can tell that he feels much better due to the orthopedic quality foam. The rim around the bed allows him to prop his head up so he can still see what's going on. The sizes are generous. Max is a very large dog and the "Large" size swallow him up! Their "Extra Large" must be for a pony or two large dogs! Five Stars ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐
customer_reviews.author: dilworthdude

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2! Have a 8 year old Pit. He was so happy he tried to lay on it when it was still halfway in the box! He has a heated throw that we tossed on top of it for his joints (it's cold where we are) and he is loving every second of it! Our 4 year old Akita who is 100lbs can lounge like a giant polar bear and it VERY comfortable all stretched out. The memory foam is awesome... we even caught our 11 year old napping on it with the dog. Fast shipping. Packaging was smaller which was helpful. Item description does not do it justice. Please consider getting for your pet, they will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Alosi

customer_reviews.title: The one bed my dog hasn't chewed up
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. She's a 55 lb pit bull & the large fits her. She likes to curl up & there is room left. She fills up the bed if she completely stretches out. The bolster is perfect for her. I'm surprised she hasn't try to shred this bed like the others she's had, but maybe it's because the fabric is less chewy/fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristalb

customer_reviews.title: Attention Cat Parents!
customer_reviews.text: Not just for dogs - but a great bed for cats too! As weather getting cooler, cats tend to prefer a cozy place to curl up like this bed. This bed is very well made to help my cats to get a good rest especially my fat, aging cats. The supportive foam doesn't sink in and the suede seems durable and soft. Small size is perfect. I also find this product even more ideal for cats because most cats don't dig nor pee on their bed like some dogs - easy maintenance!!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Good support, quality made
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my 10 yr old pup, that seems to be developing arthritis. She seems to comfortable . The bolster let’s her keep her head up while stretching out. When she gets up she does not limp as much, so it must be helping her. Seems like it will be easy to clean. The solid Cushioning slips right out a zippered cover. Bottom and bolster slip into separate openings. Bought a second one for the living room. Looked at several before I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed dog loves it now.
customer_reviews.text: Put the bed together and my dog would not sleep on it. Someone suggested to get my scent on it by sleeping with it for a couple of days and I saw her lay on it once, but not since then. I will try some more. Hope it works. Otherwise good quality, but not fun to stuff that foam in. Will not look forward to washing time, since I will have to take everything apart and put back together again. Well back to getting the dog to use it. Update, she loves it now. She hates to get out of it, she is sleeping great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Pampered pup
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to spend this much money on a dog bed. However, my dog stays in her bed all day while we are gone at work. The one I had was pretty, but it was cheap and after a few washings it was pretty lumpy and flat. This one was easy to assemble out of the box. It has the outer bed part, a liner and the actual orthopedic foam. Looks sturdy. With my girl getting on in years I want her to be as comfortable as possible. I think she likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Stumpf

customer_reviews.title: Pure comfort for the old girl
customer_reviews.text: Murphy says, “Now that’s what I’m talking about”! This is the Rolls-Royce of dog beds. I thought the last one was good, this puts it to shame. The bolster is big enough that she loves to rest not only her chin but her paws. This memory foam is something else. It immediately pops up to its 3 inch potential. Got to keep this poor old 14-year-old girl happy. She’s got a lot of physical aches and pains with her Cushing’s disease, and cries during the night sometimes, this is helping. Worth every penny, would probably pay twice as much if it makes her comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Pug loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my old, arthritic Pug and he loves them. I put one in the living room, one in my home office, and one in the bedroom - his 3 hangout areas. I'm doing everything to make "my boy" comfortable these days and these were worth the cost! I got three different color: light, medium, and dark. I would recommend the darker ones. They don't show stains as much, although they do show lighter Pug hair more (which is easy to vacuum off).
customer_reviews.author: John VM

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! Received dirty, USED, bed!
customer_reviews.text: This could have been five stars if it wasn't for my observation that this definitely wasn't a new item when I went to first wash it. In the center where the dog lies, under the waterproof cover, the memory foam is pee yellow and it looks like there is a poo stain. I have a 4 month old puppy who only uses this bed occasionally next to me when I'm awake on my bed. This is disgusting. Better off spending the money on a bully bed and having peace of mind that it is brand new and clean! I'm not wasting my precious time trying to figure out how to send a return of this size back. Terrible terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: How to assemble the bed components
customer_reviews.text: Could have received 5 stars but... Unable to contact Friends Forever despite contacting Amazon and googling for a phone number or web address. I need an answer to a question that is not addressed specifically. The question is: Once the black plastic bag is removed from the compressed, rolled memory foam, there is another rectangular plastic cover that encases the memory foam open at one end. Is that rectangular sheath that is in contact with the memory foam the waterproof layer and should it be retained and placed in the bed tp protect the foam? Have spent a lot of frustrating time trying to get an answer to this question...
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My Senior Canine LOVES this bed!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old Golden Retriever/Bernese Mountain Dog mix has significant arthritis for which he takes 9 pills a day. I am always looking to make him as comfortable as possible. He absolutely LOVES this bed. I love that it's indoor/outdoor weather resistant and easy to clean. The bolsters on the sides make him feel secure, too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Epplin

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a new bed for my 75 lb. Lab for 6+ months and finally decided on this one. I was very happy with the size. I've only had it for a few days, so I do not yet know how the outer fabric will hold up or wash, but it seems like it will do fine. The inner foam is good, and that is my main concern about how well it will hold up. It was a little thinner than I expected, but as long as it holds up well over time I will be happy. My dog seems to like it as well.
customer_reviews.author: KiBrDaSoLe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Finally a perfect size for a fifty pound dog. We must have eight dog beds in our home for our geriatric pets. Some are too big, others too small. These are perfect. I pray the cover resists the scratching as the dogs turn around to put themselves in their proper position for sleep. Our last beds have been from Costco, but these match in quality, although pricier. The cushion on the Costco bed got bunched up and I figure not comfortable. Mine love the bolster style and these seem comfortable. I hope the mattress holds up, as not the usual memory foam. Well protected and well packed for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Mountain gal

customer_reviews.title: I believe this bed helped my adopted dog get comfortable quickly!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loooves it! I adopted him Thursday night and by Friday night he was in it non stop. Looks nice too in the family room. I adopted a 3 year old that came from a hoarding situation so he has been pretty timid. I think having this bed helped him adjust. It’s inviting and comfortable and it helped us form a routine and give him a “safe place” that he knew was his right away. I’m so glad I paid this amount for a bed that my newly adopted dog loved right away. I had sticker shock at first but all the good reviews were exactly right. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog literally will not even go near it. I'm unsure if it's the smell, the softness, etc. but he HATES it. He's really not picky, but I've tried setting it in his normal bed spot and now he's sleeping on the hardwood floor instead. So I tried moving it around, and he avoids it as much as possible. Hopefully your dog has a better experience, but I purchased it based on reviews and now will have to return it because my dog would rather pace around all night than sleep in this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love These Beds
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these beds. I needed to replace my old ones and I looked at these and the reviews were good. These beds are so awesome. The foam padding is very thick and comfortable. I love that the covers can be taken off and put in the washing machine. They were easy to put together. As soon as I had them ready my dogs got on them and didn't want to get off. I highly recommend this particular dog bed if you are on the market for a new comfortable bed for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Woodfin

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up
customer_reviews.text: It was incredibly easy to put together and my senior chocolate lab loves it. I have put her other one next to it over the past few days and she prefers this one. The headrests are firm, but time will tell how much they will flatten as these kinds often do. High expectations though! I ordered a large for my 75 lb girl and she's happy and cozy. Not a lot of extra room though.
customer_reviews.author: ashley gloria

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very thick; quality memory foam. There is cover for the large memory foam “mattress” you wrap the foam in and then insert into the suede-like microfiber bed cover with bolsters. I sat on this and it was very comfy; you don’t immediately feel yourself hit the hard floor beneath you like some lower quality foam beds. The bolsters are thick and durable and great for pets that like pillows or who like-need to keep their heads elevated. My two small (14-15 lb) chi mixes can both stretch out on this bed together and still have extra space. Two medium sized dogs could also easily share this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi M

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Mattress pad.
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased the Large size for my 32 lb. Shiba Inu. I did not have to coax her to curl up on it...she went to it as soon as I was done assembling. The mattress pad is VERY good quality and even comes with a decently made slip cover to keep it from getting soiled. The bed's outer fabric is very soft but not thin and flimsy so I'm not worried about her tearing through the fabric. She sometimes scratches at the bed before laying down so there have been other beds where she tore the fabric. Although I just received this, I have to say so far it's great!
customer_reviews.author: K9LivesMatter

customer_reviews.title: Great softness and support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for our almost 14 year old baby, Janis. As a reference she is about 70 pounds. Like many older dogs her hind legs suffer from arthritis and we were looking for comfort and support. The large is just right for her as she likes to curl up and have a head rest. I do leave a waterproof crib mattress cover on the bed to defend against accidents and normal outside dirt. I haven't had the need to wash the cover yet, however, the sturdy zippers and ease of assembly indicate that it would be an easy job. Only problem, our other dog likes it too! Now we have to buy one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Marte

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bed and nice size. My dog is a 55lb Amstaff Terrier (pit bull). She's probably 28" tall and 36" long (nose to butt) and she has plenty of room in this bed. Think I bought the large size if I remember correctly. So far this has been a pretty decent bed. Took my dog a few days to get used to the fact this is her new bed. The old one she had was egg crate cushion material inside and was a bit beat up, and she was just used to it, but now she uses this new one all the time. The memory foam is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

product_meta.title: Friends Forever Orthopedic Dog Bed Lounge Sofa Removable Cover 100% Suede 2.5"-5" Mattress Memory-Foam Premium Prestige Edition
product_meta.description: Size:Large 36 x 28"| Color:Petwer greyDesigned with extra care, your pet's comfort is our priority. Your dog will get a solid night's sleep in this Friends Forever Chester luxurious bed. The cushioned plush poly-fill bolster provides your dog exceptional comfort, even for dogs with joint pain or arthritis. The water-resistant liner and human-grade mattress foam will provide your pet with the comfort they deserve. This orthopedic bed has been put to the test proven to be durable and long lasting. Bed Size: 36in x 28 in x 9 inch while the clearance is perfect for a small or medium dog up to 30lbs provides great head, hip and bone support. Easy to clean, the removable cover is durable, and machine-washable. You can remove the cover anytime with the pure metal zippers and keep your pet's bed clean. The cover is also fur and hair resistant with an anti-tear cover, while the bottom of the bed is finished with a non-skid, non-slip bottom sure to keep the bed in place.
